name: Soccer Legends
description: Master the beautiful game with legendary players, iconic skills, and spectacular moves

cards.title: Dribbling Maestro
cards.description: Master of ball control with lightning-fast footwork and mesmerizing moves
cards.imageDescription: Soccer player with incredible ball control, weaving through defenders with smooth dribbling moves
cards.effect: On summon: draw 1 card; Passive: Skills cost 1 less MP
cards.flavor: The ball is an extension of their soul.

cards.title: Bicycle Kick
cards.description: A spectacular overhead kick that catches defenders off guard
cards.imageDescription: Soccer player performing a dramatic bicycle kick with ball in mid-air
cards.effect: Deal 4 damage to target champion, +2 damage if you have no cards in hand
cards.flavor: When conventional moves won't cut it, go for the spectacular.

cards.title: One-Foot Double Touch
cards.description: Masterful ball control using only one foot to confuse opponents
cards.imageDescription: Soccer player showing off incredible one-foot ball control, ball bouncing rapidly
cards.effect: Draw 2 cards, opponent discards 1 card at random
cards.flavor: Precision and creativity combined into pure artistry.

cards.title: Elastico Nutmeg
cards.description: The classic Brazilian feint followed by a skillful nutmeg
cards.imageDescription: Soccer player performing the elastico move, ball passing through opponent's legs
cards.effect: Negate the next opponent action, gain 2 MP
cards.flavor: Ronaldo's signature move that left defenders in disbelief.

cards.title: Trap-Tap Lift-Jumping Turn
cards.description: A mesmerizing sequence of ball control moves that leaves opponents frozen
cards.imageDescription: Soccer player performing an intricate ball juggling sequence with trap, tap, and lift moves
cards.effect: Target champion cannot attack this turn, draw 1 card
cards.flavor: Street soccer artistry at its finest.

cards.title: Powerful Header
cards.description: A thunderous header that crashes into the goal like a cannonball
cards.imageDescription: Soccer player jumping high to head the ball with tremendous power
cards.effect: Deal 2 damage to target champion, +1 damage if you control a creature
cards.flavor: Sometimes the most direct route is the most effective.

cards.title: Blazing Speed
cards.description: Sprint past defenders with explosive acceleration
cards.imageDescription: Soccer player sprinting at incredible speed, leaving blur trails behind
cards.effect: Add 1 common card from your collection to your hand
cards.flavor: Speed is the difference between good and great.

cards.title: Long Ball Pass
cards.description: A精准的长传球 that splits the defense and creates scoring opportunities
cards.imageDescription: Soccer player delivering a perfect long pass across the field to a teammate
cards.effect: Draw 1 card, +1 MP to all your champions
cards.flavor: Vision and precision create the perfect assist.

cards.title: Passionate Soccer Fan
cards.description: An enthusiastic supporter whose energy boosts the team's performance
cards.imageDescription: Excited soccer fan in team colors, waving flags and cheering in the stands
cards.effect: When attacking: +1 damage to all champions; Passive: Gain 1 MP each turn
cards.flavor: The twelfth player on the field.

cards.title: Strict Referee
cards.description: A no-nonsense official who keeps the game fair and disciplined
cards.imageDescription: Serious soccer referee with whistle, making a strict call on the field
cards.effect: On summon: opponent discards 2 cards; Passive: Opponent skills cost 1 more MP
cards.flavor: The law of the game, enforced without mercy.

cards.title: Golden Boot Legend
cards.description: The greatest striker in soccer history, whose shots are like guided missiles
cards.imageDescription: Legendary soccer striker in action, ball trailing fire as it rockets toward goal
cards.effect: On summon: Deal 3 damage to all enemy champions; Passive: Skills deal double damage; When attacking: Gain 2 MP
cards.flavor: One shot, one goal, one legend.
